title: Hacked
body: My account got hacked it's called Seon sterling. They changed the account password. May I get ithe baking please? I used a lot of rp and effort on that account. THANK YOU ðŸ˜£ðŸ˜†ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜¥ðŸ˜¥

replies.body: We'd like to help with your specific issue individually.  Please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our account team, and we can help you out as soon as possible.  Thanks for your patience!
Hey, best thing you can do is send it a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we don't want to discuss any account information over the boards ^_^
